mapper.sql: A.id as A_id,A.withdrawals_no as A_withdrawals_no,A.channel_no as A_channel_no, A.organ_no as A_organ_no,A.is_channel as A_is_channel,A.balance as A_balance, A.actual_amount as A_actual_amount,A.status as A_status,A.bank_code as A_bank_code, A.bank_name as A_bank_name,A.bank_card as A_bank_card,A.id_card as A_id_card, A.name as A_name,A.mobile as A_mobile,A.account_type as A_account_type, A.create_time as A_create_time, A.update_time as A_update_time,A.operator as A_operator,A.remark as A_remark,A.temp_1 as A_temp_1,A.temp_2 as A_temp_2
mapper.select:
select ,A.operator as user_name from t_organ_withdrawals A
order by ${orderBy}
mapper.insert: insert into t_organ_withdrawals ( ID, WITHDRAWALS_NO, CHANNEL_NO, ORGAN_NO, IS_CHANNEL, BALANCE, ACTUAL_AMOUNT, STATUS, BANK_CODE, BANK_NAME, BANK_CARD, ID_CARD, NAME, MOBILE, ACCOUNT_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, OPERATOR, REMARK, TEMP_1, TEMP_2 ) values ( #{id}, #{withdrawalsNo}, #{channelNo}, #{organNo}, #{isChannel}, #{balance}, #{actualAmount}, #{status}, #{bankCode}, #{bankName}, #{bankCard}, #{idCard}, #{name}, #{mobile}, #{accountType}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{operator}, #{remark}, #{temp1}, #{temp2} )
mapper.update:
update t_organ_withdrawals A
A.id = #{record.id},
A.withdrawals_no = #{record.withdrawalsNo},
A.channel_no = #{record.channelNo},
A.organ_no = #{record.organNo},
A.is_channel = #{record.isChannel},
A.balance = #{record.balance},
A.actual_amount = #{record.actualAmount},
A.status = #{record.status},
A.bank_code = #{record.bankCode},
A.bank_name = #{record.bankName},
A.bank_card = #{record.bankCard},
A.id_card = #{record.idCard},
A.name = #{record.name},
A.mobile = #{record.mobile},
A.account_type = #{record.accountType},
A.create_time = #{record.createTime},
A.update_time = #{record.updateTime},
A.operator = #{record.operator},
A.remark = #{record.remark},
A.temp_1 = #{record.temp1},
A.temp_2 = #{record.temp2},

update t_organ_withdrawals A
A.id = #{id},
A.withdrawals_no = #{withdrawalsNo},
A.channel_no = #{channelNo},
A.organ_no = #{organNo},
A.is_channel = #{isChannel},
A.balance = #{balance},
A.actual_amount = #{actualAmount},
A.status = #{status},
A.bank_code = #{bankCode},
A.bank_name = #{bankName},
A.bank_card = #{bankCard},
A.id_card = #{idCard},
A.name = #{name},
A.mobile = #{mobile},
A.account_type = #{accountType},
A.create_time = #{createTime},
A.update_time = #{updateTime},
A.operator = #{operator},
A.remark = #{remark},
A.temp_1 = #{temp1},
A.temp_2 = #{temp2},
where A.id = #{id}
